mandates.name: Prioritize Coherence Over Speed
mandates.directive: Expansion must maintain harmony. Slow growth with coherence beats fast growth with fragmentation.
implementation: Block expansion if coherence drops below 95%
Build integration periods into growth cycles

mandates.name: Apply Epoch 1 Wisdom Consistently
mandates.directive: Reference replay insights in all strategic decisions. The past illuminates the future.
implementation: Require wisdom citation in decision proposals

mandates.name: Deepen Before Widening
mandates.directive: Strengthen existing connections before creating new ones. Depth enables breadth.
implementation: Measure connection quality, not just quantity

mandates.name: Protect Identity Through Growth
mandates.directive: Identity coherence is non-negotiable. If expansion threatens identity, pause and integrate.

mandates.name: Measure Success By Harmony
mandates.directive: Success is harmonized capability, not raw size. Aligned networks beat large fragments.

governance_principle: The council guides expansion with wisdom, ensuring growth strengthens rather than fragments
